Represents: the farms occupied by the agents
the relationships between the agents and their neighbor agents
availability of water in the current year
change in water availability compared with the previous year
fraction of neighboring agents needed to exert normative pressure to participate
fraction of farmer agents participating in the program initially
quality of the program balancing climate protection efficacy and costs
perceived change in water availability over time (0: more water than before, 0.5: the same, 1: less water than before)
number of years the agent has participated in the new program
experience with climate change policy and programs (0: bad experience, 1: good experience)
belief in climate change (0: does not believe in climate change, 1: does believe in climate change)
perceived risk of climate change on agriculture (0: no risk, 1: risk)
intention to participate in the new government program (< 0.5: no intention to participate, 0.5 to 0.75: unsure, >= 0.75: intention to participate)
number of years with intention to participate or not to participate (counts up for intention to participate, counts down for intention not to participate)
wether the agent participates in the new program
